body_html: It looks like a few users are having difficulty running our tutorials on Windows without these files - and I don't think they'd work standalone - so I propose we add them to r0.12. We'll remove them again when they move to the models repo (cc @nealwu), so we probably shouldn't backport this to master. Does that sound alright?
body_text: It looks like a few users are having difficulty running our tutorials on Windows without these files - and I don't think they'd work standalone - so I propose we add them to r0.12. We'll remove them again when they move to the models repo (cc @nealwu), so we probably shouldn't backport this to master. Does that sound alright?
body: It looks like a few users are having difficulty running our tutorials on Windows without these files - and I don't think they'd work standalone - so I propose we add them to r0.12. We'll remove them again when they move to the models repo (cc @nealwu), so we probably shouldn't backport this to master. Does that sound alright?
